channel.title: TIMES NOW | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/Timesnow

item.title: 20 Days Since #RGKarHorror, Mamata 'Deeply Sad, Sorry' 2-Min
item.description: 20 Days Since #RGKarHorror, Mamata 'Deeply Sad, Sorry' 2-Minute Silence For 'Shakti' Then, Resorts To 'Provocation'... Speaks Of 'Badla' & 'Burning' Anarchy, Now Didi's Only Defence? Watch the big debate on #IndiaUpfront with #PraneshRoy

item.title: Telegram CEO Pavel Durov has been making headlines since his
item.description: Telegram CEO Pavel Durov has been making headlines since his arrest at a private airport near Paris on August 24. While many stories since his arrest have focused on free speech and demands for his release, others have highlighted his anti-establishment stance. Amidst the serious charges against the Russian billionaire, a story about Durov allegedly fathering over 100 biological children has gone viral. Watch the report #TelegramCEO #PavelDurov #TNOriginals #TimesNowOriginals

item.title: Kareena Kapoor Khan papped outside her residence in Mumbai #
